person.persName: Noah Johnson (Bracken County, Kentucky, farm laborer and 2nd lieut 40th KY Inf USA)

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Lewis Johnson and Hannah A. Johnson. Married to Sarah A. Hamilton Johnson in Bracken County in March 1864. Farm laborer in Bracken County in 1860. Served in the 40th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant from July 30, 1863, to February 6, 1864.
